motion.strumminghandler¶

class motion.strumminghandler.StrummingHandler(controller, guitar)[source]¶

Bases: object

Process a frame and use the data of right hand.

Parameters:
  • controller – the Leap Controller instance.
  • guitar – the guitar that the handler takes action on.
string_positions = [None, -60, -40, -20, 0, 20, 40]¶
process(frame)[source]¶

Capture the right hand’s motion in the frame.

move_to(new_z)[source]¶

When the right index finger updates its position.

Play notes when it passes a string.

Parameters:new_z (float) – the new position on z axis

Process a chord and use the data of left hand.

  • guitar – the guitar that the handler takes action on.
division_x = [-80, -30]¶
division_z = [-25, 25]¶
chord_list = [['Em', 'Am', 'Dm'], ['G', 'C', 'F'], ['Em7', 'D', 'Bm']]¶
process(frame)[source]¶

Capture the left hand’s keytap in the frame.

move_to(touch_x, touch_z)[source]¶

When the left finger tap change chord.

Change chords when keytap.

Parameters:
  • touch_x (float) – the new position on x axis
  • touch_z (float) – the new position on x axis
